It balances comfort and durability for both professional and DIY use.

name: 3-LB (48-OZ) Premium Dead Blow Hammer and Unicast Mallet, Neon Red Color | Durable Unibody Molded Construction, Checkered Grip | Rebound and Spark Resistant, Non-Marring and Non-Sparking Design
short_description: ▲ WIDE APPLICATIONS - Perfect and must-have tools for auto body works, flooring, framing, woodworking, furniture installation, metal forming, gunsmithing and many other jobs
▲ BOUNCE RESISTANT DESIGN - Steel shot filled hammer head eliminates post-strike rebound, and transfers full energy of each blow into work piece to add extra force
▲ PREVENT MARRING AND SPARKING - High impact rubber exterior jacket delivers non-marring and anti-sparking striking, and protects work surfaces from damage and deforming
▲ DURABLE CONSTRUCTION - Heavy duty reinforced all metal interior construction provides durability and withstands daily solid striking to ensure longevity
▲ NON-SLIP GRIP AND HI-VIS COLOR - Diamond textured non-slip handle with checkered grip for more comfortable operation, and hi-visibility neon red color makes it easy to store and locate
▲ LIFETIME WARRANTY - This deadblow hammer is backed by lifetime quality guarantee for worry-free purchase
product_description: EFFICERE 3-LB (48-OZ) Premium Dead Blow Hammer is an essential striking tool for your home, garage, shop, work sites and cars. It is the perfect choice for a wide range of applications, such as automotive and auto body repairs, wood working, flooring and framing, construction, furniture installation, firearm repairs, material fabrication and leveling, machinery maintenance and a lot more. It fits a variety of your needs no matter you are a home / shop owner, contractor, mechanics technician, machinist, carpenter, gunsmith or a hobbyist. With the special design of small steel shot filled inside the head, these hammers will not bounce back after a solid strike as other common hammers. Controlling this fatiguing rebound conserves the energy of each blow with fully redirecting it to the work piece, and also absorbs most of the shock and reverberation to your arm. Featuring high-impact reinforced plastic vinyl jacket, EFFICERE double faced flat deadblow hammers protect delicate soft work surfaces from damaging and marring, eliminate sparking on steel and iron parts, and reduce the chance of deforming the work piece. Together with the heavy-duty interior core made from a durable all metal construction, our hammers are built to last long and perform well on tough material even in harsh environments.
